Summary: Biochemical reaction from ribavirin triphosphate to ribavirin monophosphate. This interaction is catalyzed by ITPA.
Biochemical reaction from ribavirin to ribavirin monophosphate. This interaction can be catalyzed by NT5C2 or ADK.
Biochemical reaction from ribavirin to ribavirin carboxylate. This interaction is catalyzed by ADA.
Biochemical reaction from ribavirin monophosphate to ribavirin. This interaction is catalyzed by NT5C2.
Biochemical reaction from ribavirin diphosphate to ribavirin triphosphate. This interaction can be catalyzed by NME2 or NME1.
Biochemical reaction from ribavirin to 1,2,4-triazole-3-carboxamide. This interaction is catalyzed by PNP.
Biochemical reaction from viramidine to ribavirin. This interaction is catalyzed by ADA.
Biochemical reaction from ribavirin monophosphate to ribavirin diphosphate. This interaction is catalyzed by GUK1.
Transport from ribavirin triphosphate to ribavirin triphosphate. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC29A3.
Transport from ribavirin to ribavirin. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLC28A3, SLC28A2 or SLC29A1.
Transport from ribavirin to ribavirin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC29A1.
Transport from ribavirin to ribavirin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC29A3.
